parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Mishma -- an Ishmaelite, also a Simeonite

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Dumah -- a son of Ishmael, also a city in Judah and a name of Edom

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Massa -- a son of Ishmael, also the realm of King Lemuel
